checks.name: public_ip_address
checks.title: Check for EC2 Instances setup for Database Migration Service with Public IP.
checks.risk: Exposing an EC2 directly to internet increases the attack surface and therefore the risk of compromise. DMS Replication instances serve to migrate the databases during the migration process and exposure can have longlasting compliance and security issues.

detect.manual: go to DMS and select replication instances

remediation.text: Ensure that replication instances are created in private subnets and do not have a public IP
